h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Gall Gem Location
content: There are tons of Soaks to be found throughout the game, across each chapter. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough. You can also keep track of the Awaken Wine Worm locations and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations, which are key items for upgrading your Gourd.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Gall_Gem.md', within the main section titled 'Gall Gem', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Gall Gem Location'.
The content is as follows:
There are tons of Soaks to be found throughout the game, across each chapter. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough. You can also keep track of the Awaken Wine Worm locations and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations, which are key items for upgrading your Gourd.
